title: Costus speciosus
Vernacular name:
Sanskrit Name : Kemukha
English Name : Crepe Ginger
Latin Name : Costus speciosus
Parts of plant used: young stem and sap from leaves
Chemical Constituents: phenolics, steroids, alkaloids, flavonoids, saponins, terpenoids, and tannins
Therapeutic uses: anti-inflammatory, anti-microbial, antioxidant, anti-dyslipidemic and anti-cancer.
